description:
Cleveland Metro

International athletic training and competition facility is hiring an Event and Sponsorship Sales Associate.

You'll be responsible for developing new business and maintaining existing relationships. You'll work alongside the leadership team to promote the facility and optimize the brand. Support capital raising for the scholarship fund, support website event content and assist in the creation of custom events and sales material.

The ideal candidate will have a BS/BA degree ,minimum two years of sponsorship sales, event procurement or media sales. A proven track record of developing client relationships, strong presentation skills, and proficiency with Microsoft Word, PowerPoint and Excel. Limited travel

For further details on this role or other full-time direct hire positions contact Pauline at 410-779-9432 or pwheeler@csrecruiting.com
